dmca.title: Piggybankofamerica getting stuffed?
dmca.body:
Via Certified Mail,
Return Receipt Requested

October 21, 2002

Re: Domain Name: piggybankofamerica.com

Dear [Private]:

It has come to our attention that you have registered the domain name piggybankofamerica.com.  Bank of America Corporation is the owner of multiple trademark registrations in the United States for BANK OF AMERICA (Registration Nos 1466524, 0932728, 0873828, and 0853860) as well as registrations worldwide.  This trademark has been in use since 1928.  Bank of America also promotes its banking and financial servise via the URL www.bankofamerica.com  It appears that you have intentionally targeted Internet users who are attempting to reach Bank of America's web site.

We consider our trademarks to be very valuable assets.  It is our opinion that your registration and use of piggybankofamerica.com is a violation of bank of america's service mark rights and is misleading to the public.  Your use of our trademark may constiture infringement and/or dilution of our mark in violation of trademark laws.  We demand that you and all other entities associated with you immediately discontinue the use of this domain name and that you promptly transfer to us your registration for this domain name and any others including a variation of BANK OF AMERICA to us.  We also demand that you remonve any mention of BANK OF AMEIRCA from your website.

Please provide us a written response to this letter no later than November 4, 2002 as to your intentions.

We look forward to hearing from you and hope this matter can be resolved quickly.

Sincerely,

Personally Signed*****
Assistant Vice President

***end of letter
dmca.sender_name: Legal Department of Bank of America Corp.
